biotools.summary: A computational method LPI-CSFFR to predict lncRNA-protein interactions from sequences, secondary structure, and physicochemical property, which makes use of deep learning CNN and further improve its performance using feature reuse strategy.

bioschemas.name: LPI-CSFFR
bioschemas.summary: A computational method LPI-CSFFR to predict lncRNA-protein interactions from sequences, secondary structure, and physicochemical property, which makes use of deep learning CNN and further improve its performance using feature reuse strategy.
